Your Sydney Holiday INCLUSIONS: Accommodation and bonuses as specified IMPORTANT INFORMATION: International and domestic flights are not included, please add best available airfare. PARKROYAL Darling Harbour The PARKROYAL Darling Harbour is located on the city side of Darling Harbour. It is within minutes of the city's most popular attractions, the hotel offers modern and comfortable premium accommodation with most of the rooms enjoying the views of Darling Harbour. Superior Room (3 Nights) Travel Dates: 9 Nov - 13 Dec 25 & 1 Feb - 31 Mar 26 Twin per person fr $814 Travel Dates: 14 Dec - 29 Dec 25 & 2 Jan - 31 Jan 26 Twin per person fr $670 Note: Captain Cook Cruises operates Wed - Sun only (exclude public holidays) Departs: Darling Harbour King St Wharf 1 at 12pm/returns 1.30pm or Circular Quay Wharf 6 at 12.30pm/returns 2pm Includes . 3 nights Parkroyal Darling Harbour in a Superior Room - FREE Wi-Fi - Captain Cook Cruises Sydney Harbour View Lunch Cruise 90 minute circuit of Sydney Harbour & 2 course contemporary a la carte menu Bonus FREE AU$100 food & beverage credit for use in ABODE or BARKERS (1 per room per stay) Per Person, from $670 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 24 Mar 2026. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Apr 2025 to 31 Mar 2026 (unless otherwise specified).International and domestic flights are not included, please add best available airfare. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE:06 Dec 23.
